General.Name: Gujarat State Petronet Limited
General.Description: Gujarat State Petronet Limited transmits natural gas through pipeline on an open access basis from supply points to demand centers in India. It develops energy transportation infrastructure and connects natural gas supply sources, including LNG terminals to various markets. It also operates city gas distribution and trading of natural gas business, as well as generates electricity through windmills. The company was incorporated in 1998 and is based in Gandhinagar, India.
